branchCategory.name: 2 Port Pilot Solenoid Valve, Ports 1/4 ~ 1 inch
branchCategory.description: <p>The VXZ series for Oil is a 2 port, pilot operated solenoid valve capable of operating at higher differential pressure by maintaining a zero pressure differential pressure on the valve seat. Flow rate ranges from Cv of 1.7 to 10.2.</p>

breadCrumb.name: 2 Port Pilot Solenoid Valve, Ports 1/4 ~ 1 inch

branchItem.name: VXZ2*3, Pilot Operated, 2 Port Solenoid Valve for Oil, Single Unit
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>Body material: brass, stainless steel <LI>Medium: Oil with viscosity not exceeding 50 mm²/s. Fluid temperature: -5 to 60°C <LI> Maximum pressure: 1.5MPa <LI>IP65 enclosure <LI>Valve type: Normally closed , Normally open</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: VXZ2*6, Pilot Operated, 2 Port Solenoid Valve for High Temperature Oil, Single Unit
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>Body material: brass, stainless steel <LI>Medium: high temperature oil, -5 to 100°C <LI> Maximum pressure: 1.5 MPa <LI>IP65 enclosure <LI>Valve type: Normally Closed, Normally Open</LI></UL>
